articles.description: Paddy Pimblett is one of the UFC's rising stars and he has grown to realise he's an athlete as well as a fighter - but he can't help his love for food.
articles.content:
Paddy Pimblett is one of the UFC's rising stars and he has grown to realise he's an athlete as well as a fighter - but he can't help his love for food.
